lead_paragraph: The initial public offering of Chrysler is expected in the second half of 2011 and it will be in more than one tranche, the American automaker's chief executive, Sergio Marchionne, said on Friday.
snippet: Chrysler's I.P.O. is expected in the second half of 2011 and it will be in more than one tranche, the American automaker's chief executive, Sergio Marchionne, said on Friday.

headline.main: Chrysler I.P.O. to Come in More Than 1 Tranche

abstract: Chrysler's I.P.O. is expected in the second half of 2011 and it will be in more than one tranche, the American automaker's chief executive, Sergio Marchionne, said on Friday.
